weapon.desc: It's small and sharp. A classic.
You can hold it in one hand. Think of the possibilities.
You're going to need a second hand for this one.
Cuts down trees, among other things.
It's like a regular axe, but for battle.
Spear meets axe, it can do it all.
Let's be honest, it's a stick.
A stick with a sharp thing on the end.
A big spear. No friend to horses.
A blunt weapon with a heavy head on the end of a handle.
For nails. Also, skulls.
The ol' ball-and-chain. And spikes.
A more accurate ranged weapon that packs a punch.
A ranged weapon that can be used in tight spaces, and while on the move.
A simple ranged weapon.
An easy to use ranged weapon, takes time to reload.
A three-pronged spear.
A knife with an inwardly curved blade.
A curved sword.
A slender, pointed sword.
Machete meets sword.
A pole weapon, generally used by mounted soldiers.
A gardening tool. Also, a murdering tool.
A polearm, with a single edged blade at the head.
A long spear-like weapon generally used in fishing.
A small, single-edged sword.
A light spear, primarily for throwing.

armor.desc: Armor made from metalic rings sewn into a leather or fabric foundation.
Armor made from the hide of an animal.
Consists of a leather base with overlapping pieces of metal.
Armor made of small metal rings linked together to form a mesh.
Limb armor where strips of metal are attached to a fabric foundation.
A combination of chainmail and metal plates protecting vital areas.
Wooden or steel, provides decent protection.
Large, heavy shield. Good at blocking missine fire.

trinket.desc: Small metal disc with a design on both sides.
A protective enclosure for a light source.
A piece of currency from a far away land.
The horn from a member of the deer family.

tags.name: Accurate
tags.desc: Nearly always strikes true.

tags.name: Bulky
tags.desc: Hard to maneuver with.

tags.name: Concealed
tags.desc: Easy to hide, hard to find.

tags.name: Deadly
tags.desc: Tends to kill whatever ends up in front of it.

tags.name: Elegant
tags.desc: You're going to fight, and look good doing it.

tags.name: Erratic
tags.desc: There's no way to know what will happen when you use this.

tags.name: Giant
tags.desc: Incredibly large. Requires great strength to use, and takes up more than the normal amount of space.

tags.name: Loud
tags.desc: Makes a lot of noise for some reason.

tags.name: Military
tags.desc: Not available in most markets, may be illegal to own.

tags.name: Powerful
tags.desc: Incredible impact when an attack conencts

tags.name: Acid
tags.desc: Deals or prevents acid damage..

tags.name: Bludgeoning
tags.desc: Deals or prevents bludgeoning damage.

tags.name: Cold
tags.desc: Deals or prevents cold damage.

tags.name: Fire
tags.desc: Deals or prevents fire damage.

tags.name: Force
tags.desc: Deals or prevents force damage.

tags.name: Lightning
tags.desc: Deals or prevents lightning damage.

tags.name: Necrotic
tags.desc: Deals or prevents necrotic damage.

tags.name: Piercing
tags.desc: Deals or prevents piercing damage.

tags.name: Poison
tags.desc: Deals or prevents poison damage.

tags.name: Psychic
tags.desc: Deals or prevents psychic damage.

tags.name: Radiant
tags.desc: Deals or prevents radiant damage.

tags.name: Slashing
tags.desc: Deals or prevents slashing damage.

tags.name: Thunder
tags.desc: Deals or prevents thunder damage.

tags.name: Lucky
tags.desc: Your luck increases while you have this.

tags.name: Infected
tags.desc: Those struck by this weapon have a chance of becoming infected.

tags.name: Cursed
tags.desc: Those struck by this weapon have a chance of becoming cursed.

tags.name: Imbalanced
tags.desc: This weapon's balance makes it hard to connect a strike, but you also become harder to hit.

tags.name: Furious
tags.desc: You become enraged while using this.
Those struck by this weapon are struck again by a weaker, spectral version of the weapon.

tags.name: Soul Bound
tags.desc: The souls of those killed by this weapon are trapped inside of it.

tags.name: Swift
tags.desc: You move faster than normal.

tags.name: Smoldering
tags.desc: Odorless smoke rises from this piece of armor.

tags.name: Deflecting
tags.desc: Ranged missiles will sometimes bounce off of you harmlessly

tags.name: Charming
tags.desc: People find you more convicing than you normally are.

tags.name: Restoration
tags.desc: Once per day, you can use this to heal someone for a small amount of health.

tags.name: Natural
tags.desc: Made from unprocessed, natural materials.

tags.name: Champion
tags.desc: This belonged to a famous champion.

tags.name: Righteous
tags.desc: You more easily discern right from wrong.

tags.name: Tracking
tags.desc: You are able to follow tracks more easily.

tags.name: Wild
tags.desc: Randomly emits harmless, magical effects.

tags.name: Seeker
tags.desc: You become aware of the location of a powerful, magical tome.

tags.name: Enchanted
tags.desc: Emits a magical aura.

tags.name: Insightful
tags.desc: You gain insight into other's intentions.

tags.name: Alien
tags.desc: An unfamiliar item, may not be able to understand it initially.

tags.name: Homemade
tags.desc: Not a particularly well made item.

tags.name: Indestructible
tags.desc: Can't be destroyed, no matter how hard you try.

tags.name: Terrifying
tags.desc: Others will tremble in fear when they see this.

tags.name: Common
tags.desc: There isn't anything exciting or unique about this.

tags.name: Grotesque
tags.desc: The stuff of nightmares.

tags.name: Artisanal
tags.desc: Crafted by the most skilled artisans. A truly unique item.

tags.name: Heavy
tags.desc: Much heavier than you would expect it to be.

tags.name: Huge
tags.desc: Takes up a ton of space. Hard to maneuver with.

tags.name: Hidden
tags.desc: Others will have a hard time spotting this.

tags.name: Lightweight
tags.desc: Easy to lift and stow.

tags.name: Broken
tags.desc: This is falling apart.

tags.name: Arcane
tags.desc: Radiates with magical energy.

tags.name: Rare
tags.desc: A truly rare item.

tags.name: Unreliable
tags.desc: Works as expected, except when it doesn't.

tags.name: Valuable
tags.desc: Worth some coin.

tags.name: Humming
tags.desc: Contstantly emits a low buzzing sound.

tags.name: Perception
tags.desc: You become more aware of your surroundings.

tags.name: Spectral
tags.desc: Once per day, this will allow you to pass through a solid object.

tags.name: Alarm
tags.desc: Vibrates when enemies are nearby.

tags.name: Stealth
tags.desc: You blend into your surroundings more easily.

tags.name: Growth
tags.desc: Small plants sprout around this if buried in the ground over night.

tags.name: Ancient
tags.desc: From a time gone by.

tags.name: Durable
tags.desc: Can withstand incredible stress.

tags.name: Holy
tags.desc: Emits a radiant aura that strikes fear into unholy abominations.

tags.name: Heroic
tags.desc: Belonged to a hero from another age.

tags.name: Frail
tags.desc: Almost ready to break.

tags.name: Guardian
tags.desc: Emits an aura of protection for nearby friends.

tags.name: Abyssal
tags.desc: You can only speak Abyssal while using this.
